course_description: This course runs throughout the length of the program. Students are provided the basis to abstract a business problem into a data-based problem and provided a methodology commonly adopted by consulting firms.  The course then combines the consulting method with the CRISP-DM framework commonly used in data science projects.  This course provides the foundation for managing projects in the capstone course.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the MSBA program.
